Package kse.utilclass.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmpleTextArea
    This extension of JTextArea adds the following features to the editor field.
    ColorSwatch
    An icon for painting a square swatch of a specified Color.
    LayeredList
    Extension of javax.swing.JList which allows a graph ordering of its elements and a folding feature of each tree node.
    LayeredList.ListElement
    Defines the basic behaviour of a list element.
    LayeredList.Model  
    LayeredOptionList
    A subclass of LayeredList to organise a list of check-box selectable list items in a tree-enabled, layered list.
    LayeredOptionList.ListElement  
    TestC_LayeredList  
    TestC_LayeredOptionList_App1  
    TestC_LayeredOptionList_App2  
    VerticalFlowLayout
    A simple yet convincing VerticalFlowLayout.
